## FlatTileBoundingBoxGenerator.(constructor)

Creates a new `FlatTileBoundingBoxGenerator` that can generate bounding boxes for the given TilingScheme.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(tilingScheme: TilingScheme, minElevation?: number, maxElevation?: number);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tilingScheme | [TilingScheme](./harp-geoutils.tilingscheme.md) | The \[\[TilingScheme\]\] used to compute bounding boxes. |
|  minElevation | number | The minimum elevation in meters. |
|  maxElevation | number | The maximum elevation in meters. |
